body_html: The original model was trained with quantization in mind, by strategically inserting a few tf.fake_quant_with_min_max_args. Toco can detect those ops and convert the whole model in a way that minimizes accuracy loss. Without fake_quant nodes, toco wouldn't be able to insert the necessary hints into the resulting .tflite model.
body_text: The original model was trained with quantization in mind, by strategically inserting a few  tf.fake_quant_with_min_max_args. Toco can detect those ops and convert the whole model in a way that minimizes accuracy loss. Without fake_quant nodes, toco wouldn't be able to insert the necessary hints into the resulting .tflite model.
body: The original model was trained with quantization in mind, by strategically inserting a few  [tf.fake_quant_with_min_max_args](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.12/api_docs/python/array_ops/fake_quantization). Toco can detect those ops and convert the whole model in a way that minimizes accuracy loss. Without fake_quant nodes, toco wouldn't be able to insert the necessary hints into the resulting .tflite model.
